name: Duelist
description: Aggressive agents who focus on eliminations and opening up sites.
primaryResponsibility: Securing kills and taking first engagements

name: Controller
description: Agents who control the battlefield using smokes and vision denial.
primaryResponsibility: Blocking sightlines and supporting the team

name: Initiator
description: Agents who start engagements by gathering information and disrupting enemies.
primaryResponsibility: Providing information and enabling team fights

name: Sentinel
description: Defensive agents who specialize in locking down sites and watching flanks.
primaryResponsibility: Defending objectives and slowing enemy pushes
